modName: HOP - Horses On Patrol - Dawnguard Armored Trolls
summary:
Expansion for the fabulous mod by jayr848: HOP - Horses On Patrol - Dawnguard.
This file adds Armed Trolls to Dawnguard patrols
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ff7700][size=5]HOP - Horses On Patrol - Dawnguard Armored Trolls[/size][/color][/center]
[color=#ffff00][size=3][b]I have permission from jayr848 to upload this! And here I prove it:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/86307-8-1503846095.jpg[/img][/b][/size][/color]

[color=#ff0000]This mod requires the original mod:[/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50847/?]Â [/url][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50847/?]HOP - Horses On Patrol - Dawnguard[/url]
[/b]
Just replace the .esp file with this one.

[color=#00ffff]I have to congratulate jayr848 for the gritty work done for this mod. Most people just download and enjoy the mod, but nobody thinks about the work and the time we took the modders to create it. Thank you very much for your mods jayr848.[/color]

All the credit for this work is for jayr848 along with the original idea. I only have the credit for adding the [color=#ff7700]Dawnguard Armored Trolls[/color] to the patrols.
Now you can see that the Dawnguard makes use of their trolls! 1, 2 or 3 both normal and Frost Armored Trolls accompanying all patrols!
[color=#ffff00]
It is in the FULL version (3 horses, 4 dogs).[/color]
